    • getDefaultAspects

      Set<String> getDefaultAspects() throws DfException
      Returns a set of name of the default aspects specified in this type and all of its supertypes. An empty list will be returned if none is specified.
      Returns:
      Set of default aspects
      Throws:
      DfException
